text: 39|9|atalla, paraleakatte parri jagrata pularttukayum, tanre raksitavinre karunyam asikkukayum ceytu keant sastangam ceytum, ninnu prart'thiccum ratri samayannalil kilâ€Œvanakkam ceyyunnavanea (atalla satyanisedhiyea uttaman?) parayuka: arivullavarum arivillattavarum samamakumea? bud'dhimanmar matrame aleaciccu manas'silakkukayullu
